document.full_text: despite bailouts for greece, ireland and portugal, europe's debt crisis may yet spread to core euro zone countries and emerging eastern europe, the international monetary fund said on thursday.
document.title: imf warns eu debt crisis may still spread to core
lines_and_colors: despite bailouts for greece, ireland and portugal, europe's debt crisis may yet spread to core euro zone countries and emerging eastern europe, the international monetary fund said on thursday.
